title: Shinitagari No Vampire
alternative_title: The Vampire has a Death Wish; 死にたがりのヴァンパイア;
status: The Vampire has a Death Wish; 死にたがりのヴァンパイア;
description:
Description :
        The university student, Yuuki, is a ghost painter who paints pictures on behalf of his father, who is a famous painter.One day, a beautiful vampire youth named Leo appears.Carrying a sad past, Leo wants to kill himself.While Yuuki is attracted to him, he could only paint his pictures.Eventually, providing a kiss as a substitute for blood gradually escalated...With a youth who has lost his "color" and an immortal vampire who is desperate to die, each day is sad but vivid.
